name: Cyber Skater
description:
𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐆𝐚𝐦𝐞:

You play as Narra, a skater girl astronaut with a hoverboard sent to explore a nearby plant. Your ship has crashed and the inhabitants of this planet are hungry… and you are on the menu! Stop the inevitable destruction of your planet by killing as many aliens as you can. See how many aliens you can kill, and play again to beat your previous high score. Purchase upgrades by picking up gold that the aliens drop. Buy upgrades like the grappling hook and more at the shop to increase your abilities and do more damage to the aliens.
